mapper.select: select * from member where member_id=#{memberId} and member_pw=#{memberPw}
mapper.insert: insert into member (member_name, member_id, member_pw, member_age, member_gender, member_email, member_address, member_tel,member_auther) values(#{memberName}, #{memberId}, #{memberPw}, #{memberAge}, #{memberGender}, #{memberEmail}, #{memberAddress}, #{memberTel}, #{memberAuther})
